summary: This mod makes the hidden Thieves Guild Shadowmarks more visible by changing the texture from a dark color to a blood red color. This also helps keeps immersion while playing.
descriptionHtml:
~Shadowmarks Revealed V1.0

~This mod makes the hidden Thieves Guild Shadowmarks more visible by changing the texture from a dark color to a blood red color. This also helps keeps immersion while playing.

~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary. 
3. Copy files to (install folder) your Skyrim Data folder. 
4. Start Skyrim Launcher and play.

~Uninstallation 
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod: 

a. All of the files that came with the mod.

~Incompatibility 
a. Any mod that changes the texture of the Shadowmarks.

If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Known Issues or Bugs 
None. If any are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Change Log
1.0 Original Release

~Future plans
a. Make a \"cheat\" version where the marks are very bright pink.
b. Make more versions (gold, text, etc.)

~Credits
None.

~Notes
None.

~LoganZezima
author: LoganZezima
